note: The Chart tab uses numeric values, with 1 for electoral democracies and 0 for non-democracies.
title: Political regime
subtitle: Based on the [classification](#dod:democracy-fh) and estimates by [Freedom House (2024)](#dod:freedom-house). Democracies are understood here as political systems in which citizens have the right to choose the chief executive and legislature in broadly free and fair elections and have substantial other political rights and civil liberties.

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches score democracy across the world?
